suncertify.presentation.gui
Interface BookingPanel

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookingControlPanel, BookingDisplayPanel, BookingSearchPanel
public interface BookingPanel

This interface is to be implemented by any panel or dialog that is used in the GUI. It enables the implementing class to be added to a List of BookingPanel. It ensures that the appropriate methods are implemented and are called when this collection is traversed.

Note: it is only required for panels that interact with the model viewer controller architecture.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Robert Black

Method Summary
 void display(java.lang.Object obj)
          This method takes an Object and depending on what type, it will update the display in the panel.
 void registerBookingController(BookingController controller)
          This method registers a reference to the controller so its methods can be called.
